title: Many Biden Cabinet Picks Are Veterans of Obama Administration
sub_head: President-elect taps officials with experience in last Democratic White House
body:
President-elect Joe Biden has chosen to fill a number of posts in his administration with people who served under President Barack Obama. Here is a list of the people he has picked who also worked in the last Democratic administration.
Ms. Rice was U.S. ambassador to the United Nations under Mr. Obama and later became national security adviser.
Mr. McDonough served as White House chief of staff in the Obama administration, and previously was deputy national security adviser and worked for the National Security Council.
Mr. Vilsack was also Agriculture secretary under Mr. Obama.
Dr. Murthy served as surgeon general during the Obama administration.
